tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: The class content would have been fun if the structure was better. The professor often went off on long tangents and did not explain directions clearly. Students had no idea what to do. I wasn\'t told how to do my assignments until week 6, so I received an F in that class when I had straight A\'s otherwise. A GPA ruiner, would not recommend

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: This class design could be cool,it\'s a history class that was designed like a D&D game. Sadly the professor completely butchered the class. Her assignments were confusing and disorganized. When you ask for help all she ends up doing is bashing you as a student. She personally insulted me more than once. I would never suggest this teacher to anyone.

comments: Extremely boring professor who just wants you to regurgitate information on her exams. Not the toughest class, but definitely one of the least interesting.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Seemed to teach personal interpretations as fact and could be really demanding of critical thought and Biblical knowledge (and participation). Was also not the clearest on assignment expectations, and had a hard time relating to the class. Nice lady though, knew her stuff and was interested in open literary discourse.. very willing to help.

tag_professor: Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is a very intelligent woman and knows the content of the class very well. However, she\'s kinda kooky and doesn\'t make sense all of the time. Also, when she says she wants participation, she doesn\'t just mean attending class. She means raising your hand and sharing, despite it being a 300 person lecture class. Not fair and she doesn\'t know ppl.

comments: She knows what she\'s talking about and is here to teach. which makes her course challenging. However she\'s understanding, intelligent and very german. I would recommend her if you\'re looking for a moderately challenging course, different kind of course because we spent alot of time discussing and reading sweet stories.
